!ENTRY system.bundle 4 0 2007-06-04 14:49:36.986
!MESSAGE FrameworkEvent.ERROR
!STACK 0
java.lang.OutOfMemoryError: PermGen space
!SESSION Mon Jun 04 14:49:39 PDT 2007 ------------------------------------------
!ENTRY org.eclipse.core.launcher 4 0

The Sun VM might run out of PermGen memory depending on usage patterns. The option to adjust the max size of that memory pool on Sun VM is "-XX:MaxPermSize".

The default value for this option is 64Mb; in Eclipse 3.3 Release Candidate 2 and later launcher sets this value to higher numbers.


*** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of bug 92250 ***
